dct_title_s: Map of Brooklyn / produced under the direction of Alexander Gross, F.R.G.S. ; compiled by the publishers (Map)
dct_description_sm: Geographia Map Company, Inc. Map shows subway lines, elevated lines, express and local stations, railroads and stations, bus and trolley routes.Shows location of railroads, subway lines, elevated lines, bus routes, trolley coach routes, and car lines. Public parks and cemeteries are colored green. Verso: Street index. Map is accompanied by booklet: "The Complete Guide to Brooklyn". The Map Collection does not have this guide.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York, N.Y.] : Geographia Map Co. Inc., [ca.1955].
